messages.subject: Re: On Choice and Freedom
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry, for some reason (operator error)  that came through without the preamble.  I lifted it from Pam Sorooshian, from her Unschooling Highlights list at
messages.messageBody:
Sorry, for some reason (operator error) that came through without the
preamble. I lifted it from Pam Sorooshian, from her Unschooling Highlights
list at http://groups.yahoo.com/group/UnschoolingHighlights/

It's message #158 from May, 2006.

***Deb I am certainly mystified that you could write something I agree with
so
whole heartedly and misunderstand me so completely! ***

Yeah, I didn't write it. <g> And I sent it to the whole list because as I
was there looking for something else it seemed a good thing to share on this
list at this time.

Cameron, (imagine me speaking in quiet, gentle tones) This isn't about you
and me, it's about you and your son and the choices you make that can either
get in the way of unschooling or help unschooling really take off for you.

Lots of people here are offering you their ideas. You don't have to read
the ideas I offer. When people post here they're posting to the whole list.

Deb Lewis
